name: UIActivityItemSource
desc: A set of methods that an activity view controller uses to retrieve the data items to act on.

items.name: func activityViewControllerPlaceholderItem(UIActivityViewController) -> Any
items.desc: Returns the placeholder object for the data.

items.name: func activityViewController(UIActivityViewController, itemForActivityType: UIActivity.ActivityType?) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the data object to be acted upon.

items.name: func activityViewController(UIActivityViewController, subjectForActivityType: UIActivity.ActivityType?) -> String
items.desc: For activities that support a subject field, returns the subject for the item.

items.name: func activityViewController(UIActivityViewController, dataTypeIdentifierForActivityType: UIActivity.ActivityType?) -> String
items.desc: For items that are provided as data, returns the UTI for the item.

items.name: func activityViewController(UIActivityViewController, thumbnailImageForActivityType: UIActivity.ActivityType?, suggestedSize: CGSize) -> UIImage?
items.desc: For activities that support a preview image, returns a thumbnail preview image for the item.

items.name: func activityViewControllerLinkMetadata(UIActivityViewController) -> LPLinkMetadata?
items.desc: Returns metadata to display in the preview header of the share sheet.
